title: I'm Daniel Ortiz
subtitle: Front-End Development
about: Hi, my name is Daniel, I have 22 years old and I'm a Web Developer specialized in the main development front-end frameworks such as Angular and React, and essential knowledge of Back-End frameworks like Sprintboot and Django. I am in my 9th cycle studying Computer Systems Engineering at Private University of the North and I really like the food of my country, Per√∫.

projects.description: E-GO is an app for creating and solving questionnaires, implementing websocket technology for use by several people in real time.
Poke List is an app created for the search and visualization of the different pokemos present in the PokeAPI
Portal 2 environment modeled in javascript with the Threejs library
API created with spring-boot for managing services in Hotel Ram
The planning department of a well-known airline is requesting a computer program to estimate ticket sales for each commercial flight of its aircraft fleet for certain national routes.
A small API created with Php for the consumption and manipulation of data in an animal shelter
